title: Blended Learning Instructional Design Scenarios for Large-Scale Introductory Geography Courses

context.additional_context: Blended learning environment using smartphones and LMS for secondary education practitioners, with summative assessment-focused evaluation methods and accessibility considerations in low-tech settings.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core theories of geography (climate, topography, population distribution) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can participate in weekly learning activities (discussions, quizzes, material submissions) using mobile devices with over 90% engagement.
Learners can complete a geographical case analysis report within four weeks through peer evaluation and feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
